ref: 546 abhyàsyati ʻ throws on ʼ ŚBr., ʻ concentrates on, prac- tises ʼ MBh., abhyasatē Mn.; abhyasana -- n. ʻ practice ʼ Mn. 2. *abhíyāsayati. [Cf. Pa. abhyāsa -- , abbhāsa -- m. ʻ repetition ʼ; Pk. abbhasaï ʻ learns ʼ: √as2]
